# Coffee

## 1.

A. New Zealand 13.34 kg/person

B. Estonia 16.8 kg/person

C. United States 4.71 kg/person

D. Finland 11.2 kg/person

E. Ethiopia 1.17 kg/person **B > A > D > C > E**
